Reviews.Title: Better than Expected
Reviews.Author: Clint V.
Reviews.Content: so i went ahead and and bought the note 2 clone why, cause i dont have $700.00 for a real one. I purchased this phone not really knowing what i was going to get because they are a few others on amazon witch look very similar. I purchased mine in mid Sept 2013 for $135. okay it came pretty fast within 5 days i guess they have these in a warehouse somewhere in the states (from Prontec) already so they don't come in all the way from china. so i got the package opened it and there it was my note 2 clone. Now i'm going to tell you exactly what i got in the box. 1 phone model N7100 NOT the "S7100" from what I can tell the diference between the two is that the N7100 is a newer model and it has the front facing camera on the right side not the left. i got 2 batteries 3100mah an extra flip back cover, cheap headphones (went straight in the garbage) a mini usb cable and charger (north american plug not eruo) and a instruction book. I did a benchmark test on the phone using antutu v4.0.2  scored 8285 which is comparable to a Samsung Galaxy S2. The real Samsung galaxy note 2 scores at over 20000.the battery life is good at the end of the day it around 50%. the build quality is excellent screen is bright and responsive. it comes with stock jellybean. nothing to complain about so far except i cant find a case for it, they sell s7100 cases on ebay so i bought one hoping it will fit but havent received it yet. For around $150 you cant go wrong the huge screen and dual core cpu is what won me over. i think generic phones like this will become more popular in the future as phones have become more and more like computers and i know a lot of people who have built there own generic computer which can out perform many "name brand Computers.im in Canada and my rogers sim card does work !

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: Fredric Sellers
Reviews.Content: This phone comes with the latest jellybean os,it has most all the bells and whistles,and is very nice to look at.It is all ready to hook to your pc just plug it in and let it do its thing.Put your sims and sd cards in set your apn if needed and start talking.Big screen,very responsive and load speaker.Phone had screen protector already installed,came with 2 batteries and a back cover that is a screen cover too.This phone has plenty of storage space and is right for the price.Now if you need a case or another screen protector you can not just go buy a note 2 product its close to fit but no wano,just look in the sellers store and you will find many different options.Dont hesitate about this phone it is worth the time.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Marquetta F.
Reviews.Content: I order this for my friend an she loves it. She said it was everythings that she could have asked for in a cell-phone now I,m getting ready to order me one.

Reviews.Title: I had 2 phones and both had issues
Reviews.Author: Shavonda
Reviews.Content: The phone actually came sooner than the expected date by at least a week. I was so excited about it. The first phone's camera flash and flashlight app didn't work properly or at all at times. I emailed the seller and she emailed me promptly within 24 hours. I had recently transferred my number and service and really needed a phone. I asked the seller if she would send me another phone since it takes so long to receive it in the mail and once I received the new one, I would send back the defected one. She agreed and did just that. When I received the second one, it seemed perfect! Everything on it worked properly...at least the flash did. First of all, I went to a relative's funeral and took pictures of family members that I hadn't seen in a while and when I later went to retrieve the pictures, none of them were saved to the phone nor my sd card. That was very upsetting. Besides that, when I would receive a call, the phone would completely power off and immediately back on several times within a single call. Even in the middle of the night when I would charge it, it would power off and never come on unless I take the battery out then power it on. However, when I contacted the seller once more about the issues with both phones, she offered a full refund once I return the 2 phones...which was a great thing on the seller's part. I really liked the style and size of the phone but the experience was disappointing, especially the second time around...Guess that's what happens when you try to get a $600 Samsung look alike for only $200.

Reviews.Title: WARNING! Defective Product being shipped to you
Reviews.Author: Paul Schottland
Reviews.Content: The video display is trashed - 100s of white lines appear on the screen from the minute I took it out of the box.  I ordered this phone to replace a real Note II. It seemed like a great deal, but then I was unable to use it, and they do not appear to ship a replacement. This company appears to be very bad in its dealings.  It would not surprise me if the positive reviews were written by some of the people at the company.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT USE THIS SELLER!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Derek L.
Reviews.Content: The phone I loved it but the home and volume keys did not work. I would have gotten another but, I sent it back since 3/31/14 and I still do not have a refund to my account. The seller is from China so not easy to deal with. DO NOT USE THIS SELLER!!!!!

Reviews.Title: I am NOT happy
Reviews.Author: Islander P
Reviews.Content: I was excited thinking I was going to get a "GALAXY NOTE 2" but I got a bigger phone named "android" which reduces my connectivity by 45% if not more. I guess I was blinded by excitement and didn't realize that phone was actually fake. Oh well, I guess I learn my lesson the hard way.

Reviews.Title: DANGER, WILL ROBINSON! BUYER BEWARE!
Reviews.Author: Gregg L. DesElms "Gregg L. DesElms"
Reviews.Content: WARNING: THIS IS NOT A SAMSUNG brand GALAXY NOTE II PHONE! IT IS A CHEAP CHINESE KNOCK-OFF!And it's not even really a bargain, at that. If it at least matched the specifications of the actual Samsung Galaxy Note II, yet still cost the same as this one, then THAT at least might be something to at least consider... but ONLY consider, as far as I'm concerned.For the record, the phone that this one is trying to confuse you into thinking it might be has four times the "internal" SD storage (what this phone calls "ROM"), and four times the memory (RAM) that this knock-off has. The REAL Samsung Galaxy Note II also has a quad-core processor, whereas this cheap one has only a dual-core.One of the biggest things you'll notice with this knock-off phone, though -- especially if you ever lay it on a table next to a REAL Samsung Galaxy Note II -- is the really crappy, by comparison, screen of this phone. The Super-AMOLED screens that Samsung makes for the Galaxy-family phones is unbelievable! They have the whitest whites, and blackest blacks (so, in other words, their contrast is excellent... superior, even), and brightest and most beautiful colors you'll ever see on a phone. Any phone -- and I mean ANY phone, including an iPhone, or an HTC, or a Motorloa, or... well... any of them -- which you lay on a table next to a Samsung Super-AMOLED screen will look downright pale, even at full brightness, compared with a Samsung Super-AMOLED screen.Additionally, according to its description, this phone is only a 3G phone; whereas the REAL Note II is a 4G phone. And, of course, this phone cannot possibly have the Samsung TWLauncher on it.Seriously, SHAME ON AMAZON for even allowing this product to be sold bearing a TRADEMARKED name!And no end-user should have anything to do with it.__________________________________Gregg L. DesElmsNapa, California USA

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Paul Falzone "falzone.p"
Reviews.Content: It works just like the add said no problems opening or closeing the cover and there is everything you want and need

Reviews.Title: cell phones that work and do make connections
Reviews.Author: kimberly
Reviews.Content: I think that the galaxy note 2 cell phone is the most awesome cell phone their is and it can make calls to anywhere at anytime it deserves everything a phone could have.

Reviews.Title: Disappointing
Reviews.Author: M. Coronado "dragonsayl"
Reviews.Content: You get what you pay for, unfortunately.  It will not pick up my WiFi at home unless i am right on top of the router and the signals for both SIMs are extremely weak.  I had another type of phone that had two SIMS and other only reason I needed an upgrade is because the internal storage only 164MB.  I saw this online and decided to try.  I can't even download anything because it requires a WiFi connection for downloads.  I think whatever antenna it has is very weak or broken. Waste of money.

Unlocked world GSM phone. 3G-850/2100, 2G -850/900/1800/1900
Compatible with at&t;, T-Mobile, Straight Talk, Simple Mobile and other GSM networks
Please make sure your SIM card is not locked with PUK code
3G HSPA+ - 850/2100 bands. Fully compatible with AT&T;, Stright Talk(AT&T; Tower) & Net10 (AT&T; Tower) at 3G HSPA+. Compatilble with T-Mobile, ------>Simple Mobile, Straight Talk(T-Mobile Tower) & Net10 (T-Mobile Tower) at 2G (EDGE). For Straight Talk, Simple Mobile or Net 10 will require a manual APN setup
Free Tether - Use your 3G data service as a WiFi hot spot and connect your notebook, ipad or other device for free. No need to pay monthly tether fee
ProductInfo.Name: Unlocked Android Note 2 Star S7100 Unlocked 1.2 Ghz Dual Core 3g Smartphone with Wi-fi, Gps, Bluetooth, IPS Touch (Black)
